Please follow these steps to randomize this patient:

  1. Login to the randomization application HERE. You will need to:
    • Identify yourself
    • For the patient Identification, enter the OpenClinica patient number (you can see it at the top right of this screen)
    • Pay attention to the treatment randomly allocated
  2. Logout from the randomization application and fill in the information requested below

Please follow these steps to randomize this patient:

  1. Login to the randomization application HERE. You will need to:
    • Identify yourself
    • For the patient Identification, enter the OpenClinica patient number (you can see it at the top right of this screen)
    • Pay attention to the treatment randomly allocated
  2. Logout from the randomization application and fill in the information requested below

OpenClinica:FormDetails.OpenClinica:RevisionNotes: Median fields are optional, new ranges for breast, tumour bed and ax level 1

OpenClinica:Section.SectionInstructions: <script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript"> var cssRules; for (var S = 0; S < document.styleSheets.length; S++){ if (document.styleSheets[S]['rules']){ cssRules = 'rules'; } if (document.styleSheets[S]['cssRules']){ cssRules = 'cssRules'; } for (var R = 0; R < document.styleSheets[S][cssRules].length; R++){ if (document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].selectorText == ".aka_text_block"){ document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].style["width"] = "50em"; document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].style["textAlign"] = "left"; } } } </script>

Glossary of the CTCAE terms:

  1. Pain of skin: Characterized by marked discomfort sensation in the skin.
  2. Pruritus: Characterized by an intense itching sensation.
  3. Skin Atrophy: Characterized by the degeneration and thinning of the epidermis and dermis.
  4. Skin hyperpigmentation: Characterized by darkening of the skin due to excessive melanin deposition.

Glossary of the CTCAE terms:

  1. Pain of skin: Characterized by marked discomfort sensation in the skin.
  2. Pruritus: Characterized by an intense itching sensation.
  3. Skin Atrophy: Characterized by the degeneration and thinning of the epidermis and dermis.
  4. Skin hyperpigmentation: Characterized by darkening of the skin due to excessive melanin deposition.

<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript"> var cssRules; for (var S = 0; S < document.styleSheets.length; S++){ if (document.styleSheets[S]['rules']){ cssRules = 'rules'; } if (document.styleSheets[S]['cssRules']){ cssRules = 'cssRules'; } for (var R = 0; R < document.styleSheets[S][cssRules].length; R++){ if (document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].selectorText == ".aka_text_block"){ document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].style["width"] = "50em"; document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].style["textAlign"] = "left"; } } } </script>

<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript"> var cssRules; for (var S = 0; S < document.styleSheets.length; S++){ if (document.styleSheets[S]['rules']){ cssRules = 'rules'; } if (document.styleSheets[S]['cssRules']){ cssRules = 'cssRules'; } for (var R = 0; R < document.styleSheets[S][cssRules].length; R++){ if (document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].selectorText == ".aka_text_block"){ document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].style["width"] = "50em"; document.styleSheets[S][cssRules][R].style["textAlign"] = "left"; } } } </script>

Glossary of the CTCAE terms:

  1. Heart failure:Characterized by the inability of the heart to pump blood at an adequate volume to meet tissue metabolic requirements,or,the ability to do so only at an elevation in the filling pressure.
  2. Acute coronary syndrome:Characterized by signs and symptoms related to acute ischemia of the myocardium secondary to coronary artery disease.The clinical presentation covers a spectrum of heart diseases from unstable angina to myocardial infarction.
  3. Esophagitis:Characterized by inflammation of the esophageal wall.
  4. Esophageal stenosis:Characterized by a narrowing of the lumen of the esophagus.
  5. Brachial plexopathy:Characterized by regional paresthesia of the brachial plexus,marked discomfort and muscle weakness,and limited movement in the arm or hand.
  6. Pneumonitis:Characterized by inflammation focally or diffusely affecting the lung parenchyma.
  7. Pulmonary fibrosis:Characterized by the replacement of the lung tissue by connective tissue,leading to progressive dyspnea,respiratory failure or right heart failure.
  8. Pain of skin:Characterized by marked discomfort sensation in the skin.
  9. Pruritus:Characterized by an intense itching sensation.
  10. Skin Atrophy:Characterized by the degeneration and thinning of the epidermis and dermis.
  11. Skin hyperpigmentation:Characterized by darkening of the skin due to excessive melanin deposition.

Glossary of the CTCAE terms:

  1. Heart failure:Characterized by the inability of the heart to pump blood at an adequate volume to meet tissue metabolic requirements,or,the ability to do so only at an elevation in the filling pressure.
  2. Acute coronary syndrome:Characterized by signs and symptoms related to acute ischemia of the myocardium secondary to coronary artery disease.The clinical presentation covers a spectrum of heart diseases from unstable angina to myocardial infarction.
  3. Esophagitis:Characterized by inflammation of the esophageal wall.
  4. Esophageal stenosis:Characterized by a narrowing of the lumen of the esophagus.
  5. Brachial plexopathy:Characterized by regional paresthesia of the brachial plexus,marked discomfort and muscle weakness,and limited movement in the arm or hand.
  6. Pneumonitis:Characterized by inflammation focally or diffusely affecting the lung parenchyma.
  7. Pulmonary fibrosis:Characterized by the replacement of the lung tissue by connective tissue,leading to progressive dyspnea,respiratory failure or right heart failure.
  8. Pain of skin:Characterized by marked discomfort sensation in the skin.
  9. Pruritus:Characterized by an intense itching sensation.
  10. Skin Atrophy:Characterized by the degeneration and thinning of the epidermis and dermis.
  11. Skin hyperpigmentation:Characterized by darkening of the skin due to excessive melanin deposition.

OpenClinicaRules:DiscrepancyNoteAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: A CTAE term, a Grade, a Start date, a Result and either a Sop date (or Continued), should be specified.
If Acute Toxicity = No, all remaining items should be blank.

OpenClinicaRules:ShowAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: Please, fill in the required data on acute toxicity.

OpenClinicaRules:HideAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: All items should be blank if there is no Acute Toxicity.

OpenClinicaRules:DiscrepancyNoteAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: if Continued=Yes, Result cannot be Recovered or Death; If Continued=NO, Result cannot be Recovering or Unknown.
Start date of toxicity should be posterior to the Radiotherapy start date
Stop date cannot be previous to Start date.
A Stop date should be specified if Continued=No (but should be left blank if Continued=Yes).
If ChronicToxicity = No, all remaining items should be blank.
A CTAE term, a Grade, a Start date, a Result and either a Sop date (or Continued), should be specified.

OpenClinicaRules:ShowAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: Please, fill in the required data on chronic toxicity.

OpenClinicaRules:HideAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: All items should be blank if there is no Chronic Toxicity.

OpenClinicaRules:DiscrepancyNoteAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: if Continued=Yes, Result cannot be Recovered or Death; If Continued=NO, Result cannot be Recovering or Unknown.
A Stop date should be specified if Continued=No (but should be left blank if Continued=Yes).
Stop date cannot be previous to Start date.
If Comorbidities = No, all remaining items should be blank.
A Condition should be specified, and whether is Currently active or not.

OpenClinicaRules:ShowAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: Please, fill in the required data on comorbidities.

OpenClinicaRules:HideAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: All items should be blank if there are no comorbidities.

OpenClinicaRules:DiscrepancyNoteAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: If Concomitant antineoplasi medication = No, all remaining items should be blank.
A Drug, a Start date and either a Sop date (or Continued), should be specified.

OpenClinicaRules:ShowAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: Please, fill in the required data on Concomitant antineoplasic medication.

OpenClinicaRules:HideAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: All items should be blank if there was no Concomitant antineoplasic medication.

OpenClinicaRules:DiscrepancyNoteAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: Stop date cannot be previous to Start date.
A Stop date should be specified if Continued=No (but should be left blank

OpenClinicaRules:ShowAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: Now the patient can be randomized

OpenClinicaRules:HideAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: The patient cannot be randomized unless all selection criteria are verified.

OpenClinicaRules:DiscrepancyNoteAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: If Previous Antineoplasic Medication = No, all remaining items should be blank.
A drug, a start date and either a Sop date or Continued, should be specified
Date of signature of informed consent cannot be previous to study start date.
A Stop date should be specified if Continued=No, but should be left blank if Continued=Yes.
Stop date cannot be previous to Start date.

OpenClinicaRules:ShowAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: Please enter the requested info on previous medications

OpenClinicaRules:DiscrepancyNoteAction.OpenClinicaRules:Message: Surgery date should be previous to Date of signature of Informed consent
Stop date cannot be previous to Start date.
Radiotherapy Start date cannot be previous to Randomization date.
Randomization date cannot be previous to Informed Consent date
Start date of toxicity should be posterior to the Radiotherapy start date.
Start date of toxicity should be posterior to the Radiotherapy start date
Cause of death is Breast Cancer, but no locarl, regional or distant recurrence is indicated.
If Start date is previous to randomization date, this should be reported as Previous medication rather than Concomitant medication.

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: COMOR_NO_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_COMOR_COM_EXISTS ne 1 and (I_COMOR_COM_CONDITION ne "" or I_COMOR_COM_DATE_DIAGN ne "" or I_COMOR_COM_ACTIVE ne "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: COA_CONT_STOP
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_COMED_COMED_CONTIN eq 1 and I_COMED_COMED_STOPDATE ne "") or (I_COMED_COMED_CONTIN eq 0 and I_COMED_COMED_STOPDATE eq "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: COA_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_EXISTS eq 1 and (I_COMED_COMED_DRUG eq "" or I_COMED_COMED_STARDATE eq "" or I_COMED_COMED_CONTIN eq "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: ATOX_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_ACUTE_ACTOX_EXISTS eq 1 and (I_ACUTE_ACTOX_CTCAE eq "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_GRADE eq "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_STARTDATE eq "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_CONTIN eq "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_RESULT eq "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: CTOX_CONT_STOP
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_CONTIN eq 1 and I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_STOPDATE ne "") or (I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_CONTIN eq 0 and I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_STOPDATE eq "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: CTOX_CONT_RESULT
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_CONTIN eq 1 and (I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_RESULT eq 0 or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_RESULT eq 1 or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_RESULT eq 3)) or (I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_CONTIN eq 0 and (I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_RESULT eq 2 or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_RESULT eq 4))

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: SURV_DEATH_CAUSE_BC
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_SURVI_SURV_CAUSEDEATH eq 0 and I_SURVI_LOCREC_SURV eq 0 and I_SURVI_REGREC_SURV eq 0 and I_SURVI_DISTREC_SURV eq 0

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: PMA_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_PREVM_PREVMED_EXISTS eq 1 and (I_PREVM_PREVMED_DRUG eq "" or I_PREVM_PREVMED_STARTDATE eq "" or (I_PREVM_PREVMED_CONTIN eq "" and I_PREVM_PREVMED_STOPDATE eq ""))

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: PMA_CONT_STOP
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_PREVM_PREVMED_CONTIN eq 1 and I_PREVM_PREVMED_STOPDATE ne "") or (I_PREVM_PREVMED_CONTIN eq 0 and I_PREVM_PREVMED_STOPDATE eq "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: ATOX_NO_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_ACUTE_ACTOX_EXISTS ne 1 and (I_ACUTE_ACTOX_CTCAE ne "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_GRADE ne "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_STARTDATE ne "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_CONTIN ne "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_RESULT ne "" or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_STOPDATE ne "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: CTOX_NO_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_EXISTS ne 1 and (I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_CTCAE ne "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_GRADE ne "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_STARTDATE ne "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_CONTIN ne "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_STOPDATE ne "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_RESULT ne "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: PMA_NO_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_PREVM_PREVMED_EXISTS ne 1 and (I_PREVM_PREVMED_DRUG ne "" or I_PREVM_PREVMED_STARTDATE ne "" or I_PREVM_PREVMED_CONTIN ne "" or I_PREVM_PREVMED_STOPDATE ne "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: COMOR_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_COMOR_COM_EXISTS eq 1 and (I_COMOR_COM_CONDITION eq "" or I_COMOR_COM_ACTIVE eq "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: ATOX_CONT_STOP
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_ACUTE_ACTOX_CONTIN eq 1 and I_ACUTE_ACTOX_STOPDATE ne "") or (I_ACUTE_ACTOX_CONTIN eq 0 and I_ACUTE_ACTOX_STOPDATE eq "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: ATOX_CONT_RESULT
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: (I_ACUTE_ACTOX_CONTIN eq 1 and (I_ACUTE_ACTOX_RESULT eq 0 or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_RESULT eq 1 or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_RESULT eq 3)) or (I_ACUTE_ACTOX_CONTIN eq 0 and (I_ACUTE_ACTOX_RESULT eq 2 or I_ACUTE_ACTOX_RESULT eq 4 ))

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: COA_NO_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_COMED_COMED_EXISTS ne 1 and (I_COMED_COMED_DRUG ne "" or I_COMED_COMED_STARDATE ne "" or I_COMED_COMED_CONTIN ne "" or I_COMED_COMED_STOPDATE ne "")

OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.Name: CTOX_MISSINGS
OpenClinicaRules:RuleDef.OpenClinicaRules:Expression: I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_EXISTS eq 1 and (I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_CTCAE eq "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_GRADE eq "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_STARTDATE eq "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_CONTIN eq "" or I_CHRON_CHRONTOX_RESULT eq "")
